title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
2. In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated Parmesan cheese.
3. Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy.
4. Drain spaghetti and mix it with pancetta.
5. Remove from heat, quickly mix in the egg mixture, stirring constantly to create a creamy sauce.
6. Season with black pepper and serve hot.

title: Classic Pancakes
instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and sugar.
2. In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients, mixing until smooth.
4. Heat a pan, pour batter to form pancakes, and cook until bubbles appear.
5. Flip and cook for another minute.
6. Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions:
1. Cut chicken into strips and marinate in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger for 10 minutes.
2. Heat oil in a pan, cook chicken until golden brown.
3. Add chopped bell peppers, carrots, and onions. Stir-fry for 5 minutes.
4. Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice.
